TestCaseMetaData.name: Final result to corrected (FRU) Header
TestCaseMetaData.Description: The EHR system receives and incorporates an electronic lab result message. This test plan and the previous test plan are designed to test the EHR-S' capability to process the progression from a "preliminary" to "final" to "corrected" microbiology Culture and Sensitivity reports.
TestCaseMetaData.PreCondition: Patient information is pre-loaded in the EHR-S. No other Pre-Condition.
TestCaseMetaData.PostCondition: The test message information received by the EHR-S has been incorporated with the patient's record.
TestCaseMetaData.TestObjectives: Demonstrate ability to import and incorporate a final and corrected result microbiology message when the filler order number uniquely identifies the test ordered. (FRU profiles).
